title: Cruz joins Republicans slamming Biden's vow to name a Black woman to Supreme Court, calling it 'offensive' - ABC News
content:
1. Cruz joins Republicans slamming Biden's vow to name a Black woman to Supreme Court, calling it 'offensive'  ABC News
  2. 'The Five' reveal whether Americans support Biden's plan for the Supreme Court  Fox News
  3. Cruz calls Biden's promise to nominate first Black woman to Supreme Court 'offensive' and 'insulting'  CNN
  4. The 3 Republicans to watch as Biden picks his SCOTUS nominee - POLITICO  POLITICO
  5. Gabbard says Biden picked 'disaster' Harris due to same 'identity politics' behind Supreme Court search  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, has joined other Republicans in criticizing President Joe Biden for his promise to name a Black woman to the Supreme Court.
